item.description:
Thank you for visiting the Metrowest (MA) Ruby Group. This January 11th date is the date at this time. This is planned as a Discussion/Social gathering, meant to foster the Ruby Community in the Metrowest area.

Directions and instructions for the location are detailed at the bottom.

Here is a proposed agenda for the Meetup. The timing of each item is flexible. It's a gathering, not a seminar.


Introduction to the MetroWest Ruby Meetup:

*What's this meetup for?
*When will it meet?
*Where does it meet (broach subject of alternating locations?)
*Who is the intended audience?


Mixer round Robin (Go around the room):

*Tell us about yourself. (meeting #1 is all, subsequent meetups are just the new folk.)
*Tell us how you use Ruby
*Tell us how you would like to use Ruby


Ruby news items:

*Cover recent Ruby news items and discuss what that means to us/how does it effect the space?
*Point out any particularly neat or cool projects going on in the world with Ruby


Random Socializing and Food:

*We'll have snacks of some sort, but can also order delivery.


Wrapping Up:

*Emphasize the meetup site for suggestions and ideas
*Solicit suggestions for topics for the next meetup
*Thanks you, goodnight Cleveland! (Boot everyone out.)

----

Directions and Parking:

We're in the public cafe in Building Three. It's something like a Rebecca's...if you've ever been to one of those.

Here is a link to the location.

http://maps.google.co...

There should be plenty of parking.

More details and pictures of which building on campus we're in to follow.
item.name: The Metrowest (MA) Ruby January Meetup - CONFIRMED!
